definition: trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: CITIC Bank , formerly known as CITIC Industrial Bank, was founded in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 中信银行原称中信实业银行，创建于1987年。

sentences.english: Edie and her mom thanked the Lord for His faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 爱狄和母亲都感谢主的信实。

sentences.english: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
sentences.chinese: 那呼召你们的是信实的，他必成就这事。

sentences.english: The burden of sincerity in Christ lies squarely upon those men who are called as true workmen of God;
sentences.chinese: 那些神呼召的真正工人身上担着基督里的信实。

sentences.english: They were accusing God of unfaithfulness.
He will judge the world in righteousness and the peoples in his truth.
sentences.chinese: 他要按公义审判世界，按他的信实审判万民。

sentences.english: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father;
sentences.chinese: 你信实何广大，我神我天父。

sentences.english: The people had rebelled against God, who had been faithful and gracious to them.
sentences.chinese: 神信实恩慈地待以色列人，他们却背逆了祂。

sentences.english: Faithful is He that calleth you, who will also do it.
sentences.chinese: 那召你们的本是信实的，祂必成就这事。

sentences.english: But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you, and keep you from evil.
sentences.chinese: 但主是信实的，要坚固你们，保护你们脱离那恶者。

sentences.english: Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!
sentences.chinese: 你的信实广大，显在我身。

sentences.english: God is always good, always faithful.
sentences.chinese: 而上帝是永远全善的，永远信实的。

sentences.english: God is faithful and just and He will forgive us our sins.
sentences.chinese: 神是信实的，是公义的，必要赦免我们的罪。

sentences.english: Open ye the gates, and let the just nation, that keepeth the truth, enter in.
sentences.chinese: 你们打开城门，好让遵守信实的正义民族进去。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
to maintain/to adhere to/to observe (an injunction etc)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
